price: 1. Artėja prie žmonių jų atsiskaitymas, o jie nusigręžia nerūpestingai.
arabic: ٱقۡتَرَبَ لِلنَّاسِ حِسَابُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: iq'taraba lilnnāsi ḥisābuhum wahum fī ghaflatin muʿ'riḍūna
